roleset.name: mean
roleset.note: NASTY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, comparison to 'cruel.01'. (from nasty.01-j)

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: However it is nasty on the aged with the real values of their pensions going down and them being unable to demand pay rises .
example.arg: with the real values of their pensions going down and them being unable to demand pay rises

example.text: The garlic ice cream is nasty!
